name:
Kirby™ Battle Royale:
Update
description:
An update for Kirby™ Battle Royale is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of Kirby™ Battle Royale should download the update. This will update the software to Version 3.0 with the following amendments:

- Various bug fixes.


• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
